name: CheckPool - Mining Pool Monitor
description: CheckPool helps you to monitor statistics of your miners. Simply choose a pool, specify address that you want to monitor and app will show you all related information.  AutoCheck is a main feature of this app, enable it and you will receive notifications directly on your phone about changes of the worker state.  Supported Pools (200+): 1stpool.org 2Miners 99Miners Ahashpool AikaPool Aionmine.org Aionpool.tech ALTpool ArQmA Mining Pool BaikalMine BCMonster BeePool Bitcoiin Pool (pde00.dragonmining.cloud) BitPool.ro Bittube Official BLAKE2S Cryptocartel Blakepool Blazepool Block Masters Bobbs Zelpool BohemianPool Bsod Btc.com Pool BTCPrivate BTGpool.pro BuckMine Bytecoin-Pool.org c0banpool c3pool Callistopool.org Cash2pool Ckpool Clona Clopool.org CLOpool.pro Coinblockers CoinMagi Pool (pom.m-hash) Coinmine.pl CoinMinerz CoinMiningPool Coinstop.me Comining.io Cpu-pool.com Crazy Mining Pools Crypto9Coin Cryptodig.ru Cryptoknight Cryptopool.at CryptoPool.Space DBIX Mine House Pool DBIXMine Dgpool.ru dOdO pool Dwarfpool Easyhash.pro Easymine.online Electronero Mining Pool Electronero Pulse Mining Pool Ellaism Dev Mining Pool Emcd Energi Minecrypto.pro Epool.io Equihash.pro Equihub equipool.1ds.us ETC Trk Etc.hvpps.net Etcget.net Etherdig Etherdig.RU Ethermine Bitfly Europool.me Ezil Dual Mining F2Pool FairHash FairPool FarMine.net Fast Pool Flypool Bitfly FOMOMiners Forgetop getHash.cc GinasisMining Gonsmine ESN Gos.cx GpuHot.com Grimm Mining Pool Grinmint Hash Refinery HashPex HashVault Hellominer.com HeroMiners Hiveon Hydnora Mining Pool Hyperpool Icemining.ca IntrepidPool Kano.is LeafPool Litecoinpool.org LTHN Official Pool LuckPool Lucky Pool org Luckyaltcoin.com LuckyPool.IO Luxor Mining Pool Majanetwork Pool Masterpro.site MaxHash Megapool.io Mine2gether MinePool Miner.Rocks Pools MinerMore Minerpool Minethechains Minexcash -
